front.title: Requirements for DAV Searching and Locating

abstract.t: The Distributed Authoring and Versioning protocol [WEBDAV] definessimple mechanisms to assign and retrieve values for properties. Thisdocument presents requirements for a WebDAV extension to supportefficient searching for resources based on WEBDAV properties andcontent. These requirements are intended to be the basis for the DAVSearching and Location (DASL) protocol.
